name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Python Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **Pydantic** to develop high-performance, scalable applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial industries. My strong background in **CI/CD** practices ensures smooth deployment processes, while my proficiency in **Git** enhances version control and collaboration within development teams. I thrive in **Agile** environments, driving efficient project execution through effective **communication** and **collaboration**.

With extensive expertise in databases and cloud services, particularly **Azure** and **AWS**, I am adept at building secure applications that comply with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. I possess a solid foundation in testing protocols that guarantee software reliability. My experience also includes architectural design using microservices and event-driven systems, which has supported the development of enterprise-grade solutions incorporating AI/ML for real-time data processing and intelligent automation.
